children.name: translate

parameters.name: y `Number`
parameters.description: The distance to translate along the Y axis.

parameters.name: x `Number`
parameters.description: The distance to translate along the X axis.

children.description: Sets translation with the specified parameters.

children.name: scale

parameters.name: scaleY `Number`
parameters.description: The scale factor on the Y axis.

parameters.name: scaleX `Number`
parameters.description: The scale factor on the X axis.

children.description: Sets scale with the specified parameters.

children.name: rotate

parameters.name: angle `Number`
parameters.description: The angle of rotation in decimal degrees.Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".Negative values or values greater than 360 will be normalized.

children.description: Sets rotation with the specified parameters.

children.name: multiply
children.description: Multiplies the transformation with another.The underlying transformation matrix is updated in-place.

children.name: matrix
children.description: Gets the current transformation matrix for this transformation.

children.name: equals
children.description: Compares this transformation with another instance.

children.name: clone
children.description: Creates a new instance with the same transformation matrix.
